name: The Star of Azkaranth
flavorText: Imbued with Azkaranth's immense powers with his dying breath.
flavorTextHtml: Imbued with Azkaranth's immense powers with his dying breath.

primary.textHtml: Reduces cooldown of all skills by [5.0 - 8.0]%.
primary.text: Reduces cooldown of all skills by [5.0 - 8.0]%.

secondary.textHtml: Prevent all Fire damage taken and heal yourself for 12% of the amount prevented. [10 - 15]%
